Reviews.Title: “No hot water in bathroom!”
Reviews.Author: Dan G
Reviews.Content: dont mind hot water sink getting flight nice hot shower winter idea cold shower appealing front desk guy inconsiderate help didnt mind narrow flight steps getting etc mattered hot water due front desks lack support recommend else staying stay

Reviews.Title: “Staff is friendly but toilets could be better”
Reviews.Author: Chris123Melbourne
Reviews.Content: top floor climb bags acceptably clean clean towers everyday shared bathroomtoilet arrangement guests considerate means sometimes entire bathroom floor wet blocked toilets walls thin means hear neighbours breakfast worse bb uk terrible hot breakfast plain cereals toast ran hot choc day menu rest stay worth price pay staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “do not stay here its for your own health”
Reviews.Author: audramayjune2010
Reviews.Content: placei arrived friend 830 saturday 29th unavailable single roomthere wasnt refund ten pound spent bleach clean especially toilet iit disgusting told morning werent ready cleaner reception cheek complain roomalthough wouldnt ready hours half pleasantly surprise size soon horror awoke bite marks luckily night left returned evening friend cup tea cup chipped crack itso decided scum day awoke bite liked friend didnt ready quicky couldnt spend anymore time suitcases train station didnt hotel didnt matter cost luggage couldnt returning home cant stop feeling sick dirty list found wrong hope strong stomach dirty toilet cold sheets shower hair bathroom floor urge sleep park bench tried breakfast wasnt brave
